overview: Death Before Dishonor XVI is an upcoming two night professional wrestling event produced by Ring of Honor (ROH), which will take place on September 28 and 29, 2018 at Orleans Arena in Las Vegas, Nevada. The first night will be a pay-per-view broadcast, while night two will be a set of TV tapings for the company's flagship program Ring of Honor Wrestling.
title: ROH: Death Before Dishonor XVI
